flawed_nl_solution:
Mary gives away 26/2 = <<26/2=13>>13 blue shirts.
Mary gives away 36/3 = <<36/3=21>>21 brown shirts.
Mary has 26-13 = <<26-13=13>>13 blue shirts left.
Mary has 36-21 = <<36-21=15>>15 brown shirts left.
Mary has 13+15 = <<13+15=28>>28 shirts left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
